awd_titl_txt: Colorimetry: Expanding and Updating Offerings for Majors andNon-Majors
awd_abstract_narration: Colorimetry, central to the color-using industries, is taught                   at few institutions, especially as it relates to textile                        coloration.  Teaching requires the use of a colorimetric                        system, and this project helps keep the teaching of colorimetry                 current and expand it to a wider audience.  It also allows the                  integration of the department's computer-aided fabric design                    and manufacture facility with the color measuring and producing                 technology.  This allows the demonstration of a complete                        production sequence from design to final fabric.  In addition,                  the complete colorimetric  system affects a course, "Color",                    for non-science majors in that it doubles the audience for this                 course, and makes the teaching more effective.
